name: Transcode Nag
description: Intelligently nags users when they transcode due to unsupported formats/codecs, while allowing bitrate-based transcoding without harassment.
overview: Smart transcoding monitor that only nags for format/codec incompatibility

versions.changelog:
"## What's Changed

- Fix: Nag once per video instead of once per login session (54559f5)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-transcode-nag/compare/v1.0.1.2...v1.0.1.3
"

"## What's Changed

- Fix: Pass session ID to SendMessageCommand (6fa387a)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-transcode-nag/compare/v1.0.1.1...v1.0.1.2
"

"## What's Changed

- Use jq for manifest.json updates (1bc7745)
- Fix: Use temporary Python file instead of inline heredoc (737fc3d)
- Fix: Correct Python heredoc in release workflow (375957b)
- Add Jellyfin plugin repository support with proper versioning (38ce74a)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/voc0der/jellyfin-transcode-nag/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.1.1
"

Initial release
- Smart detection using TranscodeReasons API
- Configurable messages and intervals
- Web UI configuration page
- Background monitoring service
